p: After completion of an eight-week period, the BW of mice were measured and obese mice were further categorized into HFD group (having only HFD), HFD + 150 (having HFD + 150 mg/kg BW plant extract), HFD + 300 (having HFD + 300 mg/kg BW plant extract) and HFD + 50 mg/kg BW orlistat). The carboxy methyl cellulose (CMC) was used as vehicle for plant extracts and orlistat.
